name: Harvest Carrot Crystals
description:
Press "G" to scan the area with your Goggles!

Gather the Crystals but be careful of the consequences!

There are 10 levels in total. (Try and look for carrots, some do not show up in your radar. Or don't :D )

Made for the Gotm.io #3 Jam!

Any tips to improve are greatly appreciated! Thanks for playing!

Awesome music by: Hart find him: https://soundcloud.com/user-682766289

and here: https://www.youtube.com/user/HartkorcraftPOWRACA/videos

https://hartkorcraft.bandcamp.com/

Game made with Godot and Asesprite and here is twitter if you wish: https://twitter.com/spoonsweet1

and now Youtube as well! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgiKD2hd3MCmVvxjHNnPe-g
